name: Hero Armored Company
description:
Description: Players who purchase now will upgrade to the final full version for free.

The domestic situation in the neighbouring republic of EVIA is volatile. Government forces are battling a number of forces, including domestic rebels and extremists. But the army was losing ground, and several major cities fell. Zawahiri, the largest rebel force, obtained large amounts of money and advanced military equipment through special channels, quickly took control of most parts of the country, and constantly sent small groups of troops to harass our borders and cause trouble. You will play a soldier in the border guards' armoured company, fighting the EVIA rebels in ZTL11 wheeled tanks, ZTQ15 light tanks, ZTZ96 main battle tanks, ZTZ99 main battle tanks, etc. .

Hero Armored Company is a thrilling modern tank war game. Real battle scenes, huge maps and advanced graphics technology will give you an exciting battlefield experience. You can not only drive a combat vehicle, you can also call in rear artillery support, helicopter support, and missile support to complete different tasks.

The game include story mode, task mode and multiplayer mode. The game is still under development and 8 levels in story mode that are currently completed. Will gradually open up mission mode and multiplayer mode, and gradually increase the number of all countries battle tanks.

◆ Modern-style battlefield background and tank chariots;
◆ Gorgeous and realistic explosion effects, as if in the battlefield;
◆ In Story mode, you will complete different tasks with your AI teammates at each level;
◆ Gain experience, money and improve your military rank in battle;
◆ In mission mode, experience is used to unlock new tanks, and money is used to purchase different ammunition and additional armor;
